transArray.content: The hotel is the one with the best sound insulation effect among the many hotels I have stayed in. The decoration is very new. The breakfast can be keyed and it will end at 12:00. Convenient, just 3.4 minutes walk from the subway. There is a shopping mall nearby so you donâ€™t have to worry about eating. We upgraded the family room with extra money, which is suitable for bringing children
